snippet: Research in Motion unveiled the new BlackBerry 10 phone and operating system that it hopes will be its salvation, in a form that looked quite rough around the edges, Ian Austen reports for The New York Times. Among the many features missing on the...
abstract: Research in Motion unveiled the new BlackBerry 10 phone and operating system that it hopes will be its salvation, in a form that looked quite rough around the edges, Ian Austen reports for The New York Times. Among the many features missing on the prototype phones is the ability to actually make phone calls.

headline.main: Daily Report: RIM Unveils Rough Version of New Phone
